Hey Mutha, how about showing a little respect and gratitude to Gondy? This dude repeatedly uploads massive amounts of high quality, problem free NBA footage whilst asking nothing in return.

Gondodon, just remember, 99% of the leechers who do not convey their thanks via a comment are thanking you internally. Your time and effort does certainly not go unappreciated. 

Cheers bro and please accept my thanks on behalf of everyone else!!
